snippet: FUTTERMAN--Ruth. Temple Beth El of Cedarhurst mourns the passing of Ruth Futterman, beloved mother of our Rabbi Matthew Futterman and Donald Futterman, grandmother and great- grandmother. Ruth was a vibrant leader of the Queens Jewish community. She and her late husband Saul both served as presidents of Temple Gates of Prayer, Flushing. We extend condolences to the entire Futterman family. May Ruth's memory be for a blessing. Richard Holland, President Edward Edelstein, Executive Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: FUTTERMAN--Ruth. Temple Beth El of Cedarhurst mourns the passing of Ruth Futterman, beloved mother of our Rabbi Matthew Futterman and Donald Futterman, grandmother and great- grandmother. Ruth was a vibrant leader of the Queens Jewish community. She and her late husband Saul both served as presidents of Temple Gates of Prayer, Flushing. We extend condolences to the entire Futterman family. May Ruth's memory be for a blessing. Richard Holland, President Edward Edelstein, Executive Director 1/3
